title: On a Theorem of Legendre on Diophantine Approximation
authors: Jaroslav Han\v{c}l and Tho Phuoc Nguyen
abstract:
Legendre's theorem states that every irreducible fraction $\frac{p}{q}$ which
satisfies the inequality $\left |\alpha-\frac{p}{q} \right | < \frac{1}{2q^2}$
is convergent to $\alpha$. Later Barbolosi and Jager improved this theorem. In
this paper we refine these results.
